scripts.build: browserify --standalone GraphicEqualizer sources/graphicEqualizer.js -o dist/graphicEqualizer.js && browserify --standalone GraphicEqualizerUi sources/graphicEqualizerUi.js  -t browserify-mustache sources/graphicEqualizer.mustache -o dist/graphicEqualizerUi.js
scripts.watch: watchify sources/graphicEqualizer.js sources/graphicEqualizerUi.js sources/demo.js -t browserify-mustache sources/graphicEqualizer.mustache -o demo.bundle.js --debug --verbose
